short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Run faster, more-effective daily standup directly in Google Meet

People arenâ€™t always prepared, they think on the spot, itâ€™s not engaging, people tune out, random topics drain the clock, and thereâ€™s no record of daily progress. If any of this sounds familiar, try Spinach.io. 

ğŸ¥¬ Before standup
Each person enters their updates in Spinach. Choose from default Yesterday, Today, Blocker categories or create your own!

Jira integration allows you to link your check-in to specific Jira tasks for deeper context.

ğŸ¥¬ Async friendly

How to get started. 
Add the Chrome Extension. Open Google Meet. Click the Spinach icon in the lower right corner. Spinach will open directly in Google Meet. 

Feedback? Questions? Help? Email us anytime at hello@spinach.io
